titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: American Society of Anesthesiologists - Description

body.p: The American Society of Anesthesiologists is an ORGANISATION .

The American Society of Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) is an educational, research and scientific association of physicians organised to raise and maintain the standards of the medical practice of anesthesiology and improve the care of the PATIENT .
For further information on the American Society of Anesthesiologists , see the American Society of Anesthesiologists website at: About ASA .
